titles.title: I Will Praise You With My Whole Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will praise you with my whole heart And offer up to you a sacrifice of joy. I will praise you with my whole heart And offer up a sacrifice of joy Offer up a sacrifice of joy.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With singing I will praise You Rejoicing I will glorify Your name. Your steadfast love and mercy never cease I will offer up a sacrifice of joy I will offer up a sacrifice of joy.{/lang-eng}
